upcoming.title: Art + Libraries in Uganda's Refugee Camps
upcoming.description: Come to learn about libraries in Uganda's refugee camps, see art and photography by refugee youths, and create art of your own! RSVP here.

upcoming.title: Art + Libraries in Uganda's Refugee Camps
upcoming.description: Come to learn about libraries in Uganda's refugee camps, see art and photography by refugee youths, and create art of your own!

past.title: Winchester Farmer's Market showcase
past.description: CLH presented refugee youth art and art from Winchester students who exchanged artwork and conversations. We also held free drawing and bracelet-making activities, and sold postcards!

past.title: Design for Our Lives screening
past.description: CLH presented about our work at a booth during the reception for the documentary film Design for Our Lives. Event information can be found here.

past.title: Winchester, MA Farmer's Market
past.description: We will be at the community booth once a month with merchandise, activities, and information, dates TBD.

past.title: World Refugee Day
past.description: Our team will be attending events in Uganda and spreading awareness about our library project.

past.title: Winchester, MA Town Day
past.description: We will have a booth with locally-made knitted items, tote bags, art activities, and more information about our project.
